item.title: New Year, New Path: From Software Engineer to Solopreneur
item.description:
As I write these words on the first day of 2025, I find myself at a pivotal moment of transformation. After dedicating nearly a decade to software engineering, working with some of the most challenging codebases and innovative technologies, I’m embarking on an entirely new journey as a solopreneur.

The past ten years in software engineering have been invaluable. They’ve taught me the importance of systematic thinking, problem-solving, and building scalable solutions. I’ve experienced the thrill of launching products, the satisfaction of optimizing complex systems, and the joy of collaborating with talented teams. However, throughout this time, I’ve felt a growing desire to create something of my own, to apply my technical expertise in a different context, and to explore the vast landscape of entrepreneurship.
